alert.note: Alert for South Willamette Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 9:54PM PST until January 02 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility less than one-quarter of a mile at times in dense fog. * WHERE...South Willamette Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Motorist should remain alert, as pedestrians may be difficult to see in the dark and fog. Likewise, pedestrians should be alert, and wear light-colored or reflective clothing, or even a light, when out and about at night in the fog.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
